job.title: Data Scientist (Reporting & Insights)
job.description: Responsibilities The Data & Analytics team provides consumer research, data reporting, and advanced analytics to understand how consumers interact with our video content & other products. This role will focus primarily on reporting and insight generation.Apply quantitative expertise ranging from data visualization to advanced statistical modelsSupport the analytics needs of clients across the following areas:Data Sourcing & WarehousingData Cleaning & PreparationExploratory Analysis Visualizations & Monitoring Key MetricsStatistical AnalysisInsight generationAssist with the creation of deliverables (e.g. presentations) and messaging to business stakeholdersEnsure the quality and timeliness of analytic deliverables meet client's expectationsContribute and build upon best practices and detailed documentation Qualifications/Requirements Bachelor’s in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, or related technical field3+ years of work experience in Business Intelligence, Analytics, or Data Science spaceProficient in Python and databases (e.g., SQL, Mongo, etc.)Experience with Tableau or similar visualization toolKnowledge of statistics and data mining techniques (e.g., Hypothesis testing, regression modeling)Proficient in MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint Desired Characteristics Ability to develop clear and concise thoughts into recommendations and findingsDemonstrated verbal and written communication skills including effective visual representation of complex dataExperience communicating results of analyses to leadership teamsPrior experience in content, digital media, and/or technology
